data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Kumgangsan, North Korea to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kumgangsan, North Korea
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Kumgangsan, North Korea.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 63 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 54,211 citizens of Kumgangsan, North Korea, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Kumgangsan, North Korea that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Deaf people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Kumgangsan, North Korea to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Kumgangsan, North Korea to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kumgangsan, North Korea has a population of 54,211.

We estimate Kumgangsan has 851 people who might know Jesus, 48 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 53,313 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 63 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Kumgangsan to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

location.name: Kumgangsan
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Mandarin, Korean, Mongol, Khalka
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Mandarin (182,000), Korean (25,208,000), Mongol, Khalka (36,000)
